price: 16 S’abritant derrière leurs serments, ils détournent les hommes de la voie d’Allah. Un châtiment humiliant les attend.
arabic: ٱتَّخَذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَهُمۡ جُنَّةٗ فَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ فَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّهِينٞ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: ittakhadhū aymānahum junnatan faṣaddū ʿan sabīli al-lahi falahum ʿadhābun muhīnun
